###############
release_groups
###############

**Module:** oceantracker.release_groups


.. toctree::
	:maxdepth: 1

	GridRelease.rst
	PointRelease.rst
	PolygonRelease.rst
	PolygonReleaseWaterDepthRange.rst

**Role:** Release particles at 1 or more given locations. Pulse_size particles are released every release_interval. All these particles are tagged as a single release_group.
